column4: ugh. i took my laptop apart and put it back together and now my wifi won't work... >:| the card is detected fine, but it does not see any AP's
you sure you didn't disconnect the little aerials attached to the wifi card?
the antennas? i did, but i put them back. now it isnt working. doesnt make much sense
unless i shorted the card out, but then i dont think it would be detected
where you sure to check they pushed on correctly(they are little buggers), and in the same order you took them off?
they are labelled, so i think? and i pushed them on till they clicked... unless that's not good enough?
that should be fine really. did you use a static band or touch a radiator to gound yourself every once in a while, as you were doing this?
but the reason i took it apart was i got shocked while using it. so i was investigating the source of the shock
LOL. probably spilt something, or maybe the speakers . . .
my only advise would be to reseat the card and the antanie again. :S but ground your self by touching a radiotor every minute or so
i might just buy a new laptop
this thing is like 2 years old anyway
LOL. cool. you can send me that one then. heheheh.
i'm gussing it would cost that much in shipping - hahahahah
